The image showing empty seats during a U: S. Senate committee hearing on border security is genuine and was taken on April 9, 2019.
The claim that: not a single Democrat" was present during the hearing is inaccurate and misleading.
The empty seats were not specific to Dem: including both Republicans and Democrats, being absent due to a vote on an unrelated matter.
Senators have multiple responsibilities: and attending hearings can sometimes overlap with other duties such as casting votes, which explains the absence of lawmakers during the final minutes of the hearing.
